\hypertarget{CourseUnit_8py_source_l00075}{}\hyperlink{classCourse_1_1CourseUnit_1_1UiCourse_aaaf2b8229f2b774f12e719bc0e6f13cb}{00075}     \textcolor{keyword}{def }\hyperlink{classCourse_1_1CourseUnit_1_1UiCourse_aaaf2b8229f2b774f12e719bc0e6f13cb}{run}(self, request, courseid):
00076         
00077         user = request.session[\textcolor{stringliteral}{'user'}]
00078 
00079         \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} request.method == \textcolor{stringliteral}{"GET"}:
00080             \textcolor{keywordflow}{if} courseid \textcolor{keywordflow}{in} user[\textcolor{stringliteral}{'courses'}]:
00081                 course = self.bus.getCourse(user, courseid)
00082                 \textcolor{keywordflow}{return} render(request, \textcolor{stringliteral}{"Course/frame.html"}, \{\textcolor{stringliteral}{'course'}:course\})
00083             \textcolor{keywordflow}{else}:
00084                 \textcolor{keywordflow}{raise} PermissionDenied(lang.DICT[\textcolor{stringliteral}{"EXCEPTION\_403\_STD"}])
00085
